title: Run full pytest suite
notes: Installed pytest dependencies and ran python3 -m pytest --capture=no with full success (255 passed, 21 skipped).

title: Review ekkokin implementation for bugs/testing gaps
description: Audit ekkokin glitchling code and tests for issues.
notes: Identified pipeline descriptor bug: weighting isn't normalized when mutated via set_param, which breaks Rust pipeline; test gap noted.

title: Extract substring swap backend into lexicon submodule
notes: Moved dictionary-driven substring helpers into glitchlings.lexicon.substring and repointed Jargoyle, Ekkokin, and Spectroll.

title: Legacy glitchling parameter cleanup
description:
Summarizes the removed aliases and YAML schema changes formerly tracked in CHANGELOG.md:
- Legacy glitchling parameter aliases (e.g., max_change_rate, replacement_rate) are removed in favor of rate.
- YAML attack rosters must use the name: field instead of deprecated type:.
- Default rate handling now lives within each glitchling; glitchlings.zoo._rate was removed.

title: Development environment reference
description:
Captured the setup guidance previously stored in docs/development.md:
- Requires Python 3.10+, optional Rust toolchain with maturin.
- Create a virtual environment, install via 'pip install -e .[dev]' (add prime or vectors extras as needed).
- Install pre-commit hooks with 'pre-commit install'.
- Rebuild or extend the bundled lexicon via 'glitchlings build-lexicon' commands when updating synonym caches.
- Run tests with 'pytest' and quality gates: ruff check ., black --check ., isort --check-only ., python -m mypy --config-file pyproject.toml, pytest --maxfail=1 --disable-warnings -q.
- Compile Rust accelerators using 'maturin develop -m rust/zoo/Cargo.toml'; toggle GLITCHLINGS_RUST_PIPELINE to force Python path.
- Additional tips: rerun maturin after editing rust/zoo/, smoke-test CLI with 'python -m glitchlings --help', keep docs/index.md aligned with behaviour changes, reference docs/release-process.md for publishing steps, and validate YAML attack rosters via glitchlings.config.ATTACK_CONFIG_SCHEMA.

title: Implement Spectroll color swapping glitchling
description: Add tests, implementation, drift mode, registration, and docs for Spectroll
notes: Implemented Spectroll glitchling with literal and drift modes, tests, docs, and examples

title: Fix Pedant casing and mile conversion
description: Preserve casing in Fewerling/Subjunic replacements and ensure Oxforda converts singular mile.
notes: Preserved casing for Fewerling/Subjunic outputs and taught Oxforda to convert singular mile with case-aware kilometre units.

title: Run tests and lint
description: Run full pytest suite and ensure linting/typing pass for current branch.
notes: Ran full pytest suite (279 passed, 17 skipped) after adding wiki_homophones.txt fixture; addressed ruff findings and re-ran lint to cleanly pass; resolved mypy issues via pedant type annotations and ekkokin typing tweaks; verified targeted pedant/ekkokin tests post-fixes.

title: Add ekkokin homophone tests
description: Expand ekkokin test coverage referencing wiki_homophones.txt per TDD.
notes:
Added ekkokin tests covering metadata and homophone replacements; currently failing (module missing).
- Generated structured homophone asset and staged it for Python/Rust consumption.
- Implemented ekkokin Python and Rust homophone pipelines with the shared asset.
- Added weighting normalization and RNG parity tests to cover expected behaviour.
Validated casing preservation and packaging coverage for the shared homophone asset.
Regenerated CLI usage docs, ran lint/type gates, and synced ekkokin tests for rust/python parity.
Set CLI doc generator to clamp COLUMNS=80 so README snapshots match the linted help output.

title: Review Pedant implementation
description: Review Pedant glitchling implementation for bugs, missed opportunities, and missing tests.
notes: Review complete. Identified case-sensitivity bug in Aetherial ligature pattern, diaeresis placement bug for 'Oo' words, and missing tests that would catch both issues.

title: Fix Rushmore pipeline tests
notes: Aligned rust pipeline tests with Rushmore plan ordering and descriptor parity; python reference now mirrors pipeline seeds before asserting Rust output. Ran pytest -o addopts='' tests/core/test_glitchling_core.py.

title: Reconcile beads workflow guidance
description: Install the bd CLI properly, run quickstart, open a tracking entry for this fix, and adjust AGENTS.md to clarify future expectations.
notes: Installed the bd CLI from the upstream release, ran quickstart, refreshed AGENTS.md with explicit setup steps, and ensured the rust extension is importable without try/except.

title: Unify Ekkokin token boundaries across Python and Rust paths
notes: Aligned the Python homophone substitution with whitespace token boundaries and added a regression test covering hyphenated pairs.

title: Fix Pedant Aetherial ligature and diaeresis
description: Address casing bug in Aetherial ligature selection and incorrect diaeresis placement for title-case words; add tests covering both scenarios.
notes: Updated Aetherial ligature pattern to be case-insensitive, fixed diaeresis placement for title-case 'Oo' digraphs, and added regression tests covering Ã†ther transformation, uppercase AE handling, and the diaeresis helper.

title: Review Pedant implementation
description: Review pedant evolution chain for bugs or missed opportunities.
notes: Identified casing regressions in Fewerling/Subjunic replacements and missing singular 'mile' conversion in Oxforda.

title: Fix mypy compat errors
notes: Resolved compat and asset helper mypy complaints; attr assignments use setattr and optional dependency load guard tightened.

title: Refactor substring swap backend for jargoyle variants
notes: Refactored Jargoyle's lexicon backend with dictionary-driven substring swaps, reused it for Ekkokin and Spectroll, and ran targeted pytest suites.

title: Fix build failures and diagnose test errors
description: Fix failing build so project installs/builds cleanly, then investigate and document current pytest failures.
notes: Replaced the broken WSL junction at src/glitchlings/assets with real files so builds/tests can see the bundled data. Verified package build (python -m build) and full pytest run now pass.

title: Normalize Ekkokin weighting in pipeline descriptor
description: Ensure weighting remains normalized when mutating Ekkokin, add regression tests.
notes: Normalized weighting via Ekkokin.set_param override and pipeline descriptor guard; added regression test asserting mutated weighting stays lowercase. Unable to run pytest because python installation lacks pip/pytest modules.

title: Install mypy
notes: Installed mypy via user pip with break-system-packages flag and verified with python3 -m mypy src

title: Merge Reduple into Rushmore with configurable attack modes
description: Combine behaviors, remove redundant docs, regenerate.
notes: Merged Reduple into Rushmore with configurable attack modes, updated tests/docs, and regenerated CLI reference.

title: Ensure rust pipeline tests run without skips
description: Alias the compiled extension, install required test dependencies, and document beads usage.
notes: Aliased the compiled _zoo_rust module into the glitchlings namespace so the rust pipeline is detected, installed the venv test dependencies, ran pytest -rs with zero skips, and clarified AGENTS.md that beads entries are mandatory.

title: Handle optional rust alias import failure
notes: Guarded optional rust alias import with try/except ImportError and re-ran mypy on src/glitchlings/__init__.py

title: Fix failing build and diagnose test errors
description: Fix failing build and diagnose test errors per user request.
notes: Replaced the broken package asset link with a real directory (plus sync helper updates) so python -m build succeeds, and pytest passes after installing pytest-cov.

title: Resolve lexicon backend merge feedback
description: Address feedback on lexicon substring module refactor and handle merge conflicts with main.
notes: Switched ekkokin, Jargoyle, and Spectroll to consume the substring helpers via the lexicon package exports, aligning with main after refactor and resolving merge drift. Reran targeted pytest suites.

title: Fix Ekkokin typing errors
notes: Ensured Ekkokin can subclass the typed Glitchling stub by adding a TYPE_CHECKING-friendly base helper and passing mypy/ruff.

title: Adjust ekkokin & spectroll assets per feedback
description: Remove doc notes, drop weighting options

title: Fix Spectroll implementation per feedback
description: Address issues with Spectroll color swapping, docs, and tests
notes: Polished Spectroll colour swap logic, refreshed CLI listing via docs/build_cli_reference.py, and reran targeted tests.

title: Implement Pedant module with deterministic evolutions
notes: Implemented pedant module with deterministic evolutions, added TDD tests, and verified pytest tests/test_pedant.py.
